affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 通常加在形容词后面, 表示"性质, 状态等"。

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指证据、证词，多系法律用语。
普通用词，在法律上指能起证明作用的，如证明、公证书以及所有的实物东西等。在生活中指任何一样可证明某一件事的真实性的东西。
指足以直接证明某事为某事实的依据，侧重作为充分证据所导致的结果。
指证据或证人，尤指后者，且有亲眼见到之意。
侧重以客观的态度进行观察。
指用眼睛跟随某物，以便对每一个变化、运动等进行观察。

word_group.phrase: call someone or something to witness

word_group.brief_definition: 特此证明；特此为证；作为…的证据
目击者证言；证人证词；证人的证言
关键证人；关键目击者；重点证人
可靠的证人；可靠的目击者
不在场证明；不在场证人
讯问证人；审查证人；检查证人
见证错误；目击错误；证人的错误

bilingual.target: 证人提供了宣誓的证词。

bilingual.source: The lawyer question the witness in court.
bilingual.target: 律师在法庭上审问证人。
证人在法庭上虚假地作证。
证人在法庭上可信地作证。
律师敏锐地质问了证人。

bilingual.source: The witness gave a statement to the police.
bilingual.target: 证人向警方提供了陈述。
法官断言了证人的证词。
证人在法庭上诚实地作证。

bilingual.source: The witness will testify in court tomorrow.
bilingual.target: 证人明天将在法庭上作证。

bilingual.source: The lawyer cross-examines the witness in court.
bilingual.target: 律师在法庭上盘问证人。

list.abstract: 黄崇旭（Witness），美籍华裔男歌手。 2001 年，签约滚石唱片。2002年，创作的单曲《生命要继续》首度被收录在由阿信与怪兽担任统筹制作的第一张新锐歌手合辑《半成年主张》中。2005年10月14日，发行首张个人专辑《黄崇旭》。2014年2月13日，发行专辑《反正就是》。
《Witness》是王宇波演唱的歌曲，收录于《暴裂无声 电影原声带》专辑中，于2018年4月9日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: Thank you, Mr. Ephraham. Your witness.
yingyinNormal.zh: 谢谢你，以法连先生，你的证人。

yingyinNormal.en: Walker's not a reliable witness. Is what he said verifiable?
yingyinNormal.zh: 沃克不是可信的证人。他的证词能被核实吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Let me call a witness, a hostile witness, who I think will tell the truth no matter what. Who? Alicia Florrick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请允许我传召证人一位敌意证人，我觉得此人无论如何都会说真话。谁？艾丽西娅福瑞克。

yingyinNormal.en: So Trey Wagner was a witness against Mr. Agos? That's right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以特雷瓦格纳是指证艾格斯先生的证人？没错。

yingyinNormal.en: Legitimately. Really, Dr Clarkson. I'm not a witness for the prosecution.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他有合理理由。克拉克森医生，我又不是控方的证人。

yingyinNormal.en: You think I'm gonna believe a fox? Well, he was a key witness, and I...
yingyinNormal.zh: 你觉得我会相信一只狐狸？他是关键目击证人，我...

yingyinNormal.en: There was no witness to the actual murder. Otherwise, he'd be serving a life sentence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有目击证人，否则，他就会判终身监禁了。

yingyinNormal.en: So you're saying they got their facts right, but the witness couldn't have seen it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以他们说的是实话，只是证人并没有目击到。

yingyinNormal.en: This witness won't return my calls, so we're gonna see if we can surprise him coming home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这个目击证人不回我电话，我们去他家堵他。

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, may I suggest... That Mr. Fornum be preserved as a rebuttal witness?
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官大人，我建议... 让佛努姆先生作为反驳证人?

yingyinNormal.en: Your Honor, we'd like to call a hostile witness to prove that this isn't true.
yingyinNormal.zh: 法官阁下，我方请求传召一名敌对证人，证明对方所述并不属实。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a witness not a perp. And no one talks like that. Yeah, no one talks like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是目击证人，不是贼人，而且没有人会那样说话。是啊，没人会那样说话。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, that has so many layers of hypotheticals and suppositions. Hey, he's your witness, not mine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 别这样，那里面有一大堆猜测和假定。他是你的证人，不是我的。

yingyinNormal.en: The one with the silver teeth. Jim Lenard. He'll make a good witness, he's likable. So is Trey.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有银牙的那个。吉姆勒纳吗？他将是一个好证人，讨人喜欢。特雷也是。

yingyinNormal.en: I was in court. A defendant took a sheriff's gun, killed a witness and then tried to shoot himself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我当时在法庭，被告人夺走了一名法警的枪，杀死一名证人，然后想要自杀。

yingyinNormal.en: The accused got a gun from the sheriff. We were at a sidebar at the bench. He hit the witness, killed him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 被告从法警身上拿到了枪，我们当时正在法官席边，他开枪射杀了证人。

yingyinNormal.en: Del, we maintain our objection. I understand. So you may call your next witness, Alicia, Dean, Cary.
yingyinNormal.zh: 戴尔，我们依然反对。我明白，那么你们可以传唤下一证人了，艾丽西娅，迪恩，凯里。

yingyinNormal.en: And you are going to hear from witness after witness who will tell you that Chad, a failed entrepreneur, couldn't handle his wife's success, that their marriage was on the rocks.
yingyinNormal.zh: 而你们将会听到一个又一个证人向你们描述查德，一个失败的企业家，无法接受他妻子的成功，他们的婚姻岌岌可危。

yingyinNormal.en: T visa? Yes. The Ruiz family has been the victim of a crime, witness intimidation. That is one of the recognized grounds for granting a T visa.
yingyinNormal.zh: T签证？是的，鲁伊兹一家是犯罪被害人，被恫吓的证人，这是授予T签证的认可条件之一。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, I can't be a public witness myself but if you offer me anonymity and immunity, I can testify privately. Tell the committee where the bodies are buried, so to speak.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我自己不能做公开证人。但你要是能给我提供匿名权和豁免权我可以私下作证告诉委员会"尸体"埋在哪了。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: By the date of his birth Europe was <highlight>witnessing</highlight> the passing of the religious drama.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到他出生之时，欧洲正经历着宗教戏剧的消亡。

sense_info_list.en: evidence of a person's strong religious beliefs, that they show by what they say and do in public

be present as someone signs (a document) or gives (their signature) to a document and sign it oneself to confirm this; 
a person who is present when an official document is signed and who also signs it to prove that they saw this happen

see an event take place, typically a crime or accident; 
a person who gives evidence in court; a person who sees something happen and is able to describe it to other people

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 通常加在形容词后面, 表示"性质, 状态等"。

word_usage.usage:
地点/时间+witness sth.，表示“见证某事发生”，通常在文章中用作背景描写，示例：
Recent years have witnessed an increase in unemployment.
近年来失业率不断上升。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 目击; 目击者; 证人

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: have knowledge of an event or change from personal observation or experience

see an event take place, typically a crime or accident; 
a person who gives evidence in court; a person who sees something happen and is able to describe it to other people
sense_info_list.zh: 目击; 目击者; 证人

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: evidence of a person's strong religious beliefs; that they show by what they say and do in public

see an event take place; typically a crime or accident; 
a person who gives evidence in court; a person who sees something happen and is able to describe it to other people
sense_info_list.zh: 目击; 目击者; 证人

examination_example.sentence: It has <highlight>witnessed</highlight> a rise in accidental drowning.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它见证了意外溺水的上升。

sense_info_list.en: have knowledge of an event or change from personal observation or experience

examination_example.sentence: It is <highlight>witnessing</highlight> various types of innovations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它见证了各种类型的创新。

sense_info_list.en:
be present as someone signs (a document) or gives (their signature) to a document and sign it oneself to confirm this; 
a person who is present when an official document is signed and who also signs it to prove that they saw this happen
sense_info_list.zh: 签名作证; 连署; 见证人; 连署人

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, 通常加在形容词后面, 表示"性质, 状态等"。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: have knowledge of an event or change from personal observation or experience

examination_example.sentence: It's a sort of observatory that allows us to <highlight>witness</highlight> those changes on our smartwatches or phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是一种天文台，让我们可以在智能手表或手机上见证这些变化。

examination_example.sentence: The late twentieth century <highlight>witnessed</highlight> the rapid development of China's economy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 二十世纪末是中国经济快速发展的时期。

sense_info_list.en: evidence of a person's strong religious beliefs, that they show by what they say and do in public
